amendatorysection.catchline: Child or spousal support; performance of decree; court powers.
amendatorysection.para: After a hearing on the issue, the court may order immediate implementation of income withholding pursuant to the Income Withholding for Child Support Act or require the posting of a bond at the time that a temporary or permanent child support or spousal support decree is issued to insure performance of the decree.

crossreference.para: Income Withholding for Child Support Act, see section 43-1701.
